reviews.review_msg: WOnderful Professor. Fair, kind, interesting, funny, smart, intensely knowledgable.  I would happily take any course Anne teaches. she is the best.
Fantastic teacher. Interesting, charming, helpful, insightful. I would be happy to take any class that she taught.

Engaging, knowledgeable, and quick. A smart guy who encourages interesting class discussion, but is stuck in his own interpretations. Willing to listen to alternatives but not consider them seriously. Fairly arrogant and cold in office hours. Gave good essay critiques and long, complex lectures. I learned a lot but didn't feel welcome in his class.

Gavin is awesome! He is really into Shakespeare and keeps the class interesting because of all his stories about his kids, his nerdy life, and so on. He's a fair marker overall. It's weird, but he wishes he could be bff with Hamlet...

I had a lot of fun in this class. Gavin seemed a bit nervous to start the class, but became more comfortable as the semester progressed. He had a lot of insightful and interesting things to say about the Shakespeare plays, and encouraged creative thought. He marks a bit tougher than other profs I've encountered, but definitely encourages improvemen

Absolutely hilarious prof who gives good insight and comments on papers. 1010 would take again. He is very clear on his expectations and is always willing to help students outside of class time. Awesome dude.
Fantastic prof. Erudite, funny, engaging. You will regret *not* taking a course with this guy during your degree.
Budra is smart and good looking. Makes it easy to go to lecture.

Budra was quite entertaining, but his constant use of pop culture references was simplistic, unenlightening, and wound up encouraging some of the most feeble discussions I've ever heard.  Mixture of funny and FRUSTRATING.
Budra Rocks, he's funny, he makes sense, his shakespeare class was great, makes you want to go to class... definately worth taking!!
